actionTemplate.title: Three-Section Eyeshadow
steps: Lay a light base across the lid from inner to outer corner
Add a mid-tone from center to outer lid for transition
Place the deepest shade on the outer V and along the lash line
Blend intersections into a smooth gradient

rationaleTemplate: Gives you more control over depth placement and eye enlargement.
Detailed but still beginner-friendly with clear zones.
